section.title: What modules are already available
section.para: Xaraya offers already many modules and extensions. A search query on the website can show several modules that might be capable to do what you need.

section.title: Should I use Dynamic Data?
section.para: There are in general two approaches you can use when developing. You can use the database directly, or use the Xaraya Dynamic Data structure for it.

The big advantage of Dynamic Data is that it is highly configurable. Site admins can use it to extend modules to hold extra data. You should first try to see if a basic Xaraya module can be extended with Dynamic Data and in this way be used for your needs.
Dynamic Data is not the easiest way to start. With flexibility comes a certain loss of usability.
